alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 10:46PM CDT until May 29 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Marshall County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Northeastern Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1046 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gilby, or 20 miles northwest of Grand Forks, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mekinock around 1050 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Poland, Manvel, Oslo, Alvarado, Tabor and March. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 145 and 160. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
